mapper.sql: OIL_DEPOT_ID, OIL_DEPOT_CODE, OIL_DEPOT_TYPE, OIL_LABEL, ALLOWANCE, OIL_DEPOT_STATUS, REMARK, MANAGE_PERSON, PHONE, PROVINCE_ID, CITY_ID, AREA_ID, OIL_DEPOT_ADDRESS, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, CORP_ID, FLAG

od.OIL_DEPOT_ID,od.OIL_DEPOT_CODE,od.OIL_DEPOT_TYPE,od.OIL_LABEL,od.ALLOWANCE,od.OIL_DEPOT_STATUS,od.REMARK, od.MANAGE_PERSON,us.USER_NAME AS MANAGE_PERSON_NAME,od.PHONE,od.PROVINCE_ID,city.CITY_NAME AS PROVINCE_NAME, od.CITY_ID,cit.CITY_NAME,od.AREA_ID,ci.CITY_NAME AS AREA_NAME,od.OIL_DEPOT_ADDRESS,od.CREATOR,u.USER_NAME AS CREATE_NAME, od.CREATE_DATE,od.CORP_ID,corp.CORP_NAME, od.FLAG

where od.del = 0 and od.OIL_DEPOT_ID = #{oilDepotId} and od.OIL_DEPOT_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{oilDepotCode},'%') and od.OIL_DEPOT_TYPE = #{oilDepotType} and od.OIL_LABEL = #{oilLabel} and od.ALLOWANCE = #{allowance} and od.OIL_DEPOT_STATUS = #{oilDepotStatus} and od.REMARK LIKE CONCAT('%',#{remark},'%') and od.MANAGE_PERSON = #{managePerson} and od.PHONE = #{phone} and od.PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId} and city.CITY_ID = #{refProvinceName} and od.CITY_ID = #{cityId} and cit.CITY_ID = #{refCityName} and od.AREA_ID = #{areaId} and ci.CITY_ID = #{refAreaName} and od.OIL_DEPOT_ADDRESS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{oilDepotAddress},'%') and od.CREATOR = #{creator} and od.CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} and od.CORP_ID = #{corpId} and od.FLAG = #{flag} and od.OIL_DEPOT_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchContent},'%')
mapper.select: select from am_oil_depot od JOIN bd_user us ON od.MANAGE_PERSON=us.USER_ID JOIN bd_city city ON od.PROVINCE_ID=city.CITY_ID JOIN bd_city cit ON od.CITY_ID=cit.CITY_ID JOIN bd_city ci ON od.AREA_ID=ci.CITY_ID JOIN bd_user u ON od.CREATOR=u.USER_ID JOIN sys_corp corp ON od.CORP_ID=corp.CORP_ID where od.DEL=0 AND od.OIL_DEPOT_ID = #{oilDepotId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into am_oil_depot (OIL_DEPOT_CODE, OIL_DEPOT_TYPE, OIL_LABEL, ALLOWANCE, OIL_DEPOT_STATUS, REMARK, MANAGE_PERSON, PHONE, PROVINCE_ID, CITY_ID, AREA_ID, OIL_DEPOT_ADDRESS, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, CORP_ID, FLAG) values (#{oilDepotCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oilDepotType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{oilLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{allowance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{oilDepotStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managePerson,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{areaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{oilDepotAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into am_oil_depot OIL_DEPOT_CODE, OIL_DEPOT_TYPE, OIL_LABEL, ALLOWANCE, OIL_DEPOT_STATUS, REMARK, MANAGE_PERSON, PHONE, PROVINCE_ID, CITY_ID, AREA_ID, OIL_DEPOT_ADDRESS, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, CORP_ID, FLAG, #{oilDepotCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oilDepotType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{oilLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{allowance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{oilDepotStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managePerson,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{areaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{oilDepotAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update: update am_oil_depot OIL_DEPOT_CODE = #{oilDepotCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OIL_DEPOT_TYPE = #{oilDepotType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OIL_LABEL = #{oilLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALLOWANCE = #{allowance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, OIL_DEPOT_STATUS = #{oilDepotStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGE_PERSON = #{managePerson,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, AREA_ID = #{areaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OIL_DEPOT_ADDRESS = #{oilDepotAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where OIL_DEPOT_ID = #{oilDepotId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update am_oil_depot set OIL_DEPOT_CODE = #{oilDepotCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OIL_DEPOT_TYPE = #{oilDepotType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OIL_LABEL = #{oilLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALLOWANCE = #{allowance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, OIL_DEPOT_STATUS = #{oilDepotStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGE_PERSON = #{managePerson,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, AREA_ID = #{areaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OIL_DEPOT_ADDRESS = #{oilDepotAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where OIL_DEPOT_ID = #{oilDepotId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select from am_oil_depot od JOIN bd_user us ON od.MANAGE_PERSON=us.USER_ID JOIN bd_city city ON od.PROVINCE_ID=city.CITY_ID JOIN bd_city cit ON od.CITY_ID=cit.CITY_ID JOIN bd_city ci ON od.AREA_ID=ci.CITY_ID JOIN bd_user u ON od.CREATOR=u.USER_ID JOIN sys_corp corp ON od.CORP_ID=corp.CORP_ID order by od.CREATE_DATE DESC

select from am_oil_depot od JOIN bd_user us ON od.MANAGE_PERSON=us.USER_ID JOIN bd_city city ON od.PROVINCE_ID=city.CITY_ID JOIN bd_city cit ON od.CITY_ID=cit.CITY_ID JOIN bd_city ci ON od.AREA_ID=ci.CITY_ID JOIN bd_user u ON od.CREATOR=u.USER_ID JOIN sys_corp corp ON od.CORP_ID=corp.CORP_ID order by od.CREATE_DATE DESC
